Our training and coaching mentorships will be configured and focused on your reality so you can make the most of using this suite of artificial intelligence-powered tools useful for restaurant owners, executive/corporate chefs, restaurant managers or directors, team leaders in general in hospitality and the restaurant industry.

step1.title: Book Your Session
step1.description: Select the plan that best fits your needs and reserve your spot in our calendar. Our recommendation is to initially hire one hour. If more sessions of 2 or 3 hours are needed, we can evaluate it together so you can better take advantage of the time and knowledge you can acquire

step2.title: Complete the Pre-Session Questionnaire
step2.description: You will receive a form to complete 48 hours before the session so we can prepare specifically for your needs.

step3.title: Personalized Session
step3.description: We connect via video conference for the consulting session, where we will develop specific strategies for your business.

step4.title: Implementation and Follow-up
step4.description: You will receive a detailed action plan and complementary resources. We include follow-up to ensure results.

question1.question: Do I need to have an active AI Chef Pro subscription?
question1.answer: Yes, you need to have an active account on AI Chef Pro to take full advantage of the consultation. We recommend at least the Pro plan to access most of the functionalities we will work with during the session.

question2.question: What platform is used for consultations?
question2.answer: We use Google Meet for consultation sessions, which allows us to share screen, record the session (if you wish) and have fluid communication. You will receive a personalized link after confirming your reservation.

question3.question: How do I prepare for the session?
question3.answer: We will send you a complete questionnaire 48 hours before the session. To make the most of it, we recommend having clear objectives, access to your AI Chef Pro account, and any relevant business data (current menus, cost information, etc.).

question4.question: What is the cancellation policy?
question4.answer: You can reschedule your session up to 24 hours in advance at no additional cost. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice are subject to a 50% charge. If you need to cancel, contact us as soon as possible to find the best solution.

question5.question: Do you offer a satisfaction guarantee?
question5.answer: Yes, we offer a complete satisfaction guarantee. If at the end of the first 30 minutes of the session you consider that you are not receiving the expected value, we will refund 100% of the amount.

question6.question: Can I request a consultation for a very specific topic?
question6.answer: Absolutely. In the preliminary form you can detail exactly what specific aspects you want to work on, whether it's a specific AI Chef Pro tool or a particular challenge in your business.

final_cta.title: Book Your Online Mentoring Now
final_cta.description: Select the type of session you prefer and find the perfect time to boost your business with AI Chef Pro. Make the most of artificial intelligence in your daily routine.

free_consultation.title: Not sure which package to choose?
free_consultation.description: Schedule a free 15-minute micro-session to discuss your needs and determine the best option for your business.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about AI Chef Pro
faq.q1: What does AI Chef Pro include?
faq.a1: AI Chef Pro includes 55+ specialized applications for gastronomy professionals, covering everything from culinary creativity to business management and digital marketing.
faq.q2: Can I use AI Chef Pro if I'm a beginner?
faq.a2: Absolutely. Our tools are designed for all skill levels, from culinary students to Michelin-starred chefs. Each application includes detailed guides and examples.
faq.q3: How does the free trial work?
faq.a3: You can access our basic plan for free with limited functionalities. To access all tools and features, you can upgrade to any of our paid plans at any time.
faq.q4: Do recipes adapt to different portion sizes?
faq.a4: Yes, all our applications include intelligent scaling systems that automatically adjust ingredients and techniques according to the number of diners.
faq.q5: Does it include support for dietary restrictions?
faq.a5: Yes, our tools can generate recipes adapted to allergies, intolerances, and specific diets (vegan, gluten-free, keto, etc.).
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your user panel. There are no permanence commitments or cancellation fees.

legal.seo_title: Legal Notice - AI Chef Pro | Legal Information
legal.seo_description: Legal information about AI Chef Pro. Terms of use, intellectual property and applicable legislation.
legal.seo_keywords: ai chef pro legal notice, legal terms, legal information
legal.heading: Legal Notice
content_paragraphs:
1. General Information

Website Owner: John Guerrero

Trade Name: AI Chef Pro

Contact Email: info@aichef.pro

Phone: +34 744 717 942

2. Purpose and Activity

AI Chef Pro is an artificial intelligence platform specialized in gastronomy that offers tools and applications for culinary professionals. Our services include over 55 specialized applications covering everything from culinary creativity to gastronomic business management.

3. Intellectual Property

All content, trademarks, logos, designs, source code, databases and any other element that forms part of AI Chef Pro are protected by intellectual and industrial property laws. Reproduction, distribution or public communication without express authorization is prohibited.

4. Content Liability

AI Chef Pro reserves the right to modify, update or remove content without prior notice. We do not guarantee the availability, continuity or infallibility of the service, although we use all technical means at our disposal to avoid interruptions.

5. External Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. AI Chef Pro is not responsible for the content, privacy policies or practices of these external sites.

6. Applicable Legislation

This legal notice is governed by Spanish law. For any dispute, the parties shall submit to the competent courts and tribunals in accordance with current legislation.

7. Contact

For any legal queries or complaints, you can contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942

privacy.seo_title: Privacy Policy - AI Chef Pro | Data Protection
privacy.seo_description: AI Chef Pro privacy policy. How we protect your personal data according to GDPR.
privacy.seo_keywords: privacy policy, data protection, gdpr ai chef pro
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
content_paragraphs:
1. Information We Collect

At AI Chef Pro, we collect information when you interact with our culinary AI services. This includes registration data, gastronomic preferences, and technical information about how you use our applications.

2. Use of Information

We use your information to personalize your culinary experience, improve our AI tools, provide technical support and develop new gastronomic features tailored to your professional needs.

3. Data Protection

We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. Your data is encrypted and stored securely.

4. Sharing Information

We do not sell, trade or transfer your personal information to third parties, except when necessary to provide our services or when required by law.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your personal data. You can also object to processing and request its limitation by contacting us.

6. Cookies

We use cookies to improve the functionality of our culinary AI applications and personalize your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

7. Contact

For any queries related to this privacy policy, you can contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942

cookies.seo_title: Cookie Policy - AI Chef Pro | Cookie Management
cookies.seo_description: Information about cookies used in AI Chef Pro. Configure your privacy preferences.
cookies.seo_keywords: cookie policy, cookie management, privacy preferences
cookies.heading: Cookie Policy
content_paragraphs:
1. What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit AI Chef Pro. They help us remember your preferences and improve your experience with our culinary AI tools.

2. Types of Cookies We Use

Essential cookies: Necessary for the basic operation of our AI applications.

Preference cookies: Remember your personalized culinary settings.

Analytics cookies: Help us understand how you use our tools to improve them.

3. Purpose of Cookies

We use cookies to personalize your gastronomic experience, remember your favorite recipes, keep your sessions active and analyze the use of our culinary AI applications to improve our services.

4. Managing Cookies

You can configure your browser to reject cookies, although this may affect the functionality of some of our AI tools. You can also delete stored cookies at any time from your browser settings.

5. Third-Party Cookies

Some cookies may be set by third-party services we use for analytics and additional functionality. These third parties have their own privacy policies.

6. Updates

This cookie policy may be updated periodically. We will notify you of significant changes.

7. Contact

If you have questions about our use of cookies, contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942

terms.seo_title: Terms of Service - AI Chef Pro | Terms of Use
terms.seo_description: AI Chef Pro terms and conditions. Rights, obligations and subscription policies.
terms.seo_keywords: terms of service, terms of use, subscription policies
terms.heading: Terms of Service
content_paragraphs:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using AI Chef Pro, you accept these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our culinary AI services.

2. Service Description

AI Chef Pro is an AI platform specialized in gastronomy offering over 55 tools for culinary professionals, including culinary creativity, world cookbooks and business management.

3. Registration and User Account

To access certain features, you must create an account providing accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

4. Permitted Use

You may use AI Chef Pro for legitimate professional gastronomic purposes. Use for illegal activities, spam, or any activity that could harm our services or other users is not permitted.

5. Intellectual Property

All content, trademarks, logos and technologies of AI Chef Pro are the property of their respective owners. AI-generated recipes and content may be used by the user according to their subscription.

6. Subscriptions and Payments

We offer different subscription plans with various features. Payments are processed securely and renewals are automatic according to the chosen plan.

7. Limitations and Liability

AI Chef Pro is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee that the service will be error-free or uninterrupted. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service.

8. Termination

We may suspend or terminate your account if you breach these terms. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your user dashboard.

9. Modifications

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of important changes by email or through notices on the platform.

10. Contact

For any queries about these terms, you can contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942
